description: Extra weight spells illness, whether it is in the form of diabetes or a heart condition, it's bound to show up if you don't do something about it. This is your guide to losing that first 10 pounds that we all struggle with.  Sometimes you don’t have to drastically cut your eating with diets or start extreme exercise regimes, you can simply look at what you eat and make sure it’s healthy. Using this ebook you can make those lbs disappear while learning a lot of information about your health. It's amazing what little changes in your life can add up to you losing 10 pounds and they all revolve around eating right and getting your body moving!
